root.str: The SABR-13's two-round burst fire mode was originally developed with ammunition conservation in mind. It has since become popular with marksmen because of its ability to reliably land those two rounds on target from long range. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Apply the single use Esamir Snow camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> That should suffice for now, enlightened one. The facility will never be safe from attack, but for now it remains fully operational.
You must be within the lightning storm on Esamir to update the mission objective (wearing an Insulated Suit or equipping Insulated Armor Plating can reduce the negative effects of the storm)
Increases the range of the Proximity Radar to 50 meters.
Taking fall damage will cloak you for 1.25 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Cannot access. Need Heavy Assault class.
Further increases the range of the EMP Spiker
Continually removes even more CO2 from the soldier's bloodstream, allowing the soldier to hold breath for a significant amount of time while using long-range optics.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Prowler by 25%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> An assault that, unsurprisingly, is taking place right now. We need you to quickly redeploy to the front lines and demonstrate that the Vanu Sovereignty is always prepared for battle.
Allows the Squad Leader to place purple smoke as a rally point.
Allows use of the long range 12x LRO sniper scope.
If a facility's SCU is destroyed then the owning empire will not be able to spawn into that facility's spawn room.
Unlock the U-150 Recall with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Lightning.
Further improve the Prowler's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
Sidearms include pistols, revolvers, and crossbows.
Feel the love with this hearts camouflage bundle, complete with a bonus gilded hearts weapon camo! All factions receive variants for their empire in this bundle.
Get it? Gives bonus Space Pumpkin Seeds and increases experience gained by 50% for 3 days. Can only be used on this character.
Applies a banner to your character. All factions can use this banner.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
The Turret Control Unit operates all phalanx turrets in the area.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> The researchers would have been able to use this vehicle bay during an emergency. If the system had more power then we may be able to determine their destination from the last entered coordinates.
Increases the top speed of the Mosquito by 3 KPH.
This armor can only be worn by the NSO Engineer.
The TAS-16 Blackjack boasts extremely high close quarters burst damage, even for a shotgun. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Great work, soldier. You have earned yourself a replication of the works of the (vastly underrated) 23rd century poet, Kachi Kantata. It will be wrapped efficiently and located in a prominent position beneath the tree.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Prowler by 20%.

The "Hummingbird" is a modified grenade printer that fires explosive smart-drones effective against enemy aircraft. The visor will lock onto enemy vehicles within range, and throwing a drone will place it on an intercept course with the target. Drones may also be dumbfired without a lock-on.
Variant of the Standard New Conglomerate Light Assault Helmet.
Adds 7 rounds to the default magazine size.
Disperses medical nanites to slowly heal nearby wounded soldiers
Primary: Assault Rifle: Equinox VE2 Burst
Looks like we can respawn at a region we control that is under attack. Respawn at Outpost Echo.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 60 rounds.
Check back weekly for brand new Player Studio items
Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. NC Only. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.
Destroy enemy explosives, MANA turrets, beacons, motion scanners, and regeneration fields.
Standard Issue Drop Pod capable of orbital entry.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to Teal.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> The immediate area around the warpgate appears hazardous, you won't be able to stay nearby for long.
Gives the Thumper automatic fire capabilities and a 20% increased fire rate, but increases the weapon's minimum cone of fire by 40%.
The enemy has the facility - a costly failure.

SPRK-33 and FL-34

Unlike many traders and merchants in Sanctuary, SPRK-33 and FL-34 traffic in goods that most terrestrial laws and regulations consider illicit. It's unclear why the two have a permanent home aboard a Nanite Systems satellite, as their actions tend to create problems for the neutral faction's reputation as an unbiased and trustworthy source of shelter, equipment, and information. The two are seemingly inseperable and are known only by their code names, uttered freely from the hijacked Combat Unit husks they operate from.
Adds ice and rime particle trails to the vehicle's wheels. All factions can use this gear.
Adds this customization to your vehicle. Only VS can use this gear.
Further improves the vehicle's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
This customization adds a Dark Green decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 shots.

Sanctuary's data broker and procurement specialist, FL-34, has received a request to acquire an unassuming package from a storage facility on Esamir. While this package will require some effort to liberate, someone with your skillset would be ideal to aid in his latest less-than-legal endeavor.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Hood Ornament. NC use only.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 224 rounds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Apply the Matte Black camo pattern to your weapon.
<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> Ever toiling to further the interests of the Vanu Sovereignty on Sanctuary, Praetor Umatherin continues her research on the Rebirthing Matrix.
This customization adds a Glowing Red decal to the cockpit glass. The cockpit glass will illuminate at night. TR use only.
You are too experienced to fight on Koltyr.
This customization adds a Glowing Blue decal to the cockpit glass. The cockpit glass will illuminate at night. NC use only.
Liberator Death From Above Glass Decal
Capture and hold all 3 Biolabs on 艾美瑞什
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to Gold. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Halftone camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> As an added reward, we are authorizing you further access to our experimental Storm Buoy for the time being. As always, Nanite Systems is grateful for your support.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Survey area bravo located. Deploy the Signal Scanner relay within the noted area.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Allows the MAX to carry additional ammunition for both weapons.
Adds the Tubular Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 5%.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Galaxy to 15 minutes.
The top Outfits will soon have a chance to prove their mettle in the ultimate showdown.
Reduces damage taken by indirect AOE hits for 24 hours. Rank 32 required.
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Premium Member: +48 Daily Passive Cert Points
Control territory and slay enemies to lock Indar
<font color="#00FFAA">Archivist Dolan:</font> I am Archivist Dolan. Despite the attire, to say I am with the Vanu Sovereignty would be... inaccurate.
[*target*] failed to be invited to your platoon.
Awarded for mastery of the Harasser, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a badge of honor for the owner's offroad achievements.
Creates an impenetrable bubble shield around the Defector.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Adds the Chrome Dunejumper Windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
The TMG-50's burst fire variant is capable of short, controlled bursts that can successfully engage enemies at long range.
Some certifications will be <font color="#ED2B2B">LOCKED</font> until you meet the prerequisites for it.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 750 rounds.
Grants access to a single-use Restoration Kit which regenerates health for 12 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Earn this ribbon by capturing and defending large bases with your Outfit. Conquered bases must have at least 20 enemies present in order to earn credit.
Allows for the creation of a single liberator gunship in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "C" Gold Hood Ornament.
Damage per bullet is increased to 350 within 10 meters, tapering to 334 at 20 meters, but this modification has heavy adverse effects on the weapon's recoil.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 missiles.

FL-34, or "Flea" to his clientele, ostensibly serves Nanite Systems as an ISO-4 broker and dealer of fine implants. It's something of an open secret on Sanctuary, however, that FL-34 also dabbles in less-than-legal shenanigans and data brokerage. Since the cataclysm, numerous advances in lightning-based technology have not gone unnoticed. Sensing an opportunity, FL-34 enlists your help with his latest "entrepreneurial endeavor," requiring data to be gathered from within the heart of Esamir's deadly electrical storm.
While out of combat, having an Engineer onboard will repair an ESF, Heavy Fighter, Valkyrie, or Liberator over time for the equivalent of rank 1 Nanite Auto-Repair.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Convincing work, child. The Aptel 216-G Datapad is yours. As is custom, this item shall be concealed, labelled, and hidden beneath foliage.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Vanguard by 25%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Nalla:</font> We've been asked to provide you with one of our hand-held mining lasers. Please speak with my associate, Coordinator Tolland, for additional information.
Woe be unto he, who does not heed the call of Liberty. All factions can use this gear.
Yellow Lumifiber Tiger Trim for the Valkyrie. NC use only.
艾美瑞什 Warp Gate North West
Underbarrel smoke grenade launcher that produces a large smoke screen capable of providing cover for a short period of time. The added weight increases the equip time of the attached weapon.
Applies a banner to your character. All factions can use this banner.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 27 minutes.
Increases the ability to see at night or while in low light conditions. Night Vision Optics work well in most situations.
Skull-themed camo. For VS use only.
Allows the user to carry an additional Rocklet Rifle magazine.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shells.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Boosts the maximum strength of the personal shield of any passengers riding in the rumble seat by 100%
Upgrade to Membership to increase your experience gain rates!
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.
This exceptional weapon will be unveiled at a later date.
Nanite Systems contracts do not cover accidental death. Try not to step in the ultra hot drill beam.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Why were these things important to the researchers? I don't see anything science-y about them. And it's not like these things can be used as giant batteries. We've tried! On to the next one.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Core Update: More efficient HIVE options were available for the core
Increases the Idle Timer on the Flash to 24 minutes.
The left handed NCM3 Raven is a laser guided rocket launcher that deals heavy damage to vehicles. NC use only.
The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield and 10% of your current (not maximum) ability energy.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.18 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Enlightened one, our technicians have picked up a faint transmission near the Shattered Warpgate and are in need of your assistance in locating the origin.
This armor can only be worn by VS Light Assault troopers.
Hurry, you qualify for Double Daybreak Cash now!
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been accepted.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.375 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Reduces damage taken from C4 by 10%
Masks player's appearance on enemy night vision scopes for 24 hours. Rank 34 required.
The Militant's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
This is now a VS outpost. Good work.
All heavy combat units are outfitted with a general purpose dumbfire rocket launcher to contest enemy vehicles as needed. NSO use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Vanguard Hood Ornament.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that you have received orders that must be delivered in person. Meet me on the deck of the carrier.
Adds 50 rounds to the default magazine size.
While equipped, blast radius and blast damage are cut in half, rate of fire is increased by 20%, and magazine size is increased by 4.
Increases the braking performance of the Flash by 10%.
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a loyalty decal to your armor or vehicle, celebrating six years of PlanetSide 2.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Infiltrator.
Reset the codes on the Security Console
Lightweight snow-camo plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Plateau camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Adequate performance, operative. I have been informated that your reward has been delivered.
Customize your Lightning with cosmetic plating. All factions can use this gear.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

Though currently not in production, the Terran Republic's powerful DMR-99 has a dedicated following of designated marksmen that stick by their tried-and-true battle rifle, rather than switch to a newer model.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster: </font> Scans have pinpointed an energy signature near the center of the crater that seems to be exacerbating the instability of the lattice network.
Adds the LC1 Bumpers to your Lightning.
Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. Only one barricade may be active at a time.
When toggled on, the player will automatically join an open squad upon logging in.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 shells.
Increases the overall handling of the Sunderer by 5%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 second.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 150 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
The gate shield generator powers the nearby gate shield.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Light Assault. TR use only.
Icarus Jump Jets provide significantly faster vertical thrust and fuel recharge rate at the cost of in-air maneuverability and overall fuel capacity.
Adds green chassis lights to the under carriage of the Vanguard.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Vanguard to 21 minutes.
Increases your total Grenade Launcher ammo capacity by 1
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 45%.
Unlock the NSX Yumi with a full complement of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
Normal fall damage now starts at 75 meters, lethal fall damage starts near 230 meters, and you take reduced damage when vehicles collide with you. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 24 minutes.
Single Use Indar Dry Brush Weapon Camo
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the noise generated by footsteps for 24 hours. Rank 44 required.
Killing an enemy player restores 20% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 75 meters.
Enter battle to the tune of this horn modeled after Irish uilleann pipes. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 38 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 100 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Upon arriving on Oshur, we detected unusual heat signatures located around the continent. This was particularly unusual as no one has set foot on these islands in hundreds of years.

In the days before open warfare on Auraxis, groups of Vanu disciples would travel to Oshur, excited by the prospect of exploring the region and communing with the ancient shrines found throughout. While no longer the thriving pilgrimage destination it once was, returning to Oshur provides an opportunity to investigate the once-popular spiritual hotspots and listen for the whispers of the long-dead alien race.

Festive Nanite Systems-approved holiday headwear.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the Auraximas event.
A spawn control unit has been destroyed.
The Pandora VX25 automatic plasma shotgun is capable of rapidly eliminating opponents in close quarters. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.

The heavily modified Viscount has a built-in suppressor which would normally render it illegal under Terran Republic law, but being built atop the Baron shotgun platform, most judicators look the other way.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> Harvesting commencing. Keep enemies away from the drill, conflict will impede our progress.
Weapons are now enabled. Eliminate enemy targets while avoiding friendly fire. Score enough points to proceed.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Well done soldier, your efforts on the battlefield have set our enemies back and our technicians are receiving the power they need to move onto the next phase of their work. Soon enough we may be able to expand off-world.
Decreases the turrets cool down period after each shot to 5.75 seconds.
This is where we start Convoy missions. Neat, eh?
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.225 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> You only got one sign-up? And it was that guy upstairs? Ugh, fine! I'll send him the gift basket, but he's going to have to enjoy that cheese and sparkling cider by himself. Thanks anyway, boyo. Here's something for your troubles.
After that we'll create some peace time so the eggheads can get their tech work done. Time to get back into the action, soldier!
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> We've detected a strange contrail signature and were able to narrow down the search area. We're getting closer!
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Inertial Dampener 3
The Triton HS3 was developed as a point defense variant of the Lasher X2, featuring a higher rate of fire than the original.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> When we first got to Oshur, we noticed a number of unusual heat signatures scattered around the continent. This was particularly strange seeing that no one has set foot on these islands in hundreds of years.
Turning this off will toggle off the chat window. (Default: On)
Neutralize a third vehicle and return it to your Warpgate
Customize your soldier's voice with this Sentinel Voice Pack. VS Male use only.
Travel a distance in a ground vehicle
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "M" Gold Hood Ornament.
Improved cruising and afterburner speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Turning this on will reverse up and down during flight. (Default: Off)
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Could not join squad because the invite has expired.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your MAX. TR use only.
The folks at NS figured out how to discharge this energy with a hand-held neutralizer. Grab a Neutralizer from Ayla, then head back to Esamir.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Mosquito by 24KPH.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font>And you've been with us since the beginning- eyeballing the remnants of the shattered warpgate, looking into the growth of those "space carrots", bringing back disabled enemy vehicles, and field-testing the first generation of storm-resistant armor.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 10%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 175 rounds.
Apply the Phoenix camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie, travel more than 3,000m with at least 2 passengers.
Earn repair experience by using the Nano-Armor Kit tool on damaged friendly vehicles and deployables.
Hovering over a region on the map screen will display current populations and capture progress.
Increases the top speed of the Sunderer by 6 KPH.
Calibrated to melt through enemy armor at close range, the extreme temperatures the Corona VM25 is capable of can liquefy the thickest armor.

The Charged Proton TD is a heavy-hitting tank destroyer plasma cannon. Plasma is fired in a state that is extremely damaging to armor at point blank range but quickly dissipates at range. This cannon requires a charge before it can be fired.
No Orbital Strike Uplink Found -- Target Lost
Xelas West Air Dock Satellite Spawn

This type of terminal is where you can create vehicles.There are several types of vehicle terminals, with each offering different sets of vehicles you can create.Interact with this ground vehicle terminal.
If this door lock is hacked, enemies will be able to pass through the door

Improve the strafe speed of the vehicle

Further reduces the time before health begins regenerating while not in combat
Adds a bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.

Increasing this slider to the right will increase the amount of observable world that is seen on the display. (Default: 74.00)
Though no doubt a top candidate for Auraxis' most unconventional weapon, the supercooled crystalline Icikill knife will chill both spines and nearby organs after coming in contact with them.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm will restock 30% of your primary and secondary weapon magazines for free.
Adds the Goliath style hubcaps to your Sunderer. NC use only.
OR Kill infantry or destroy vehicles in an ANT
This customization adds a broken glass decal to the Scythe's cockpit.

Deploy a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield for 30 seconds. Allies near the booster have greatly increased jump height.

Single use consumable. Carry up to 4 on the field between resupplies. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Allows the user to cloak for an extended period of time.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. NC use only.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Can now hover without losing altitude. Improved air brake, yaw rate and downward thrust.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Allows use of the mid-range 4x CSZ scope.
The NC2B Gauss Compact features a burst fire mode for controllable long range fire. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 14 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 26 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> While still adhering to your contracts with the three main factions, I am told you must partake in the missions we are providing to you as well.

Reduces the timer for acquiring MAX armor by 180 seconds.

Get your fireworks flare guns, spakler hood ornaments, and Patriot Camos before it's too late!

Reduces damage taken from C4 by 10%
Kill or assist killing targets near The Shattered Warpgate.
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
Engineer deployable cover can soak damage intended for allies.
The allied convoy departed without you. Another convoy can depart from [*warpgate*] in 30 minutes.
Use melee weapons or a heavy crossbow to kill enemies who are wearing Halloween Masks or Facepaint.
Activate to reduce incoming damage to the front and top armor by 67% and the side armor by 34% for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 46 seconds.
Contains HL4 Darkstar Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a cooldown between uses.
Fixed-Forward nose cannon for the aircraft. Primary weapon for the pilot.

For all the salty vet's out there - thank you for your support of PS2! Decal created by CommanderSD01.

Oshur's sandy archipelago and sparkling blue waters provide opportunities for engagement by land, sea, and air.

The suppressor reduces the noise and muzzle flash generated by the firearm, and prevents the player from showing on the minimap when firing. Bullet velocity and effectiveness at range are reduced.
The vehicle terminal allows the defending team to purchase vehicles. These vehicles then appear in the courtyard of their base.
Increases afterburner fuel replenishment rate by 40% and afterburner fuel capacity by 80%.

A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Adds 11 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. We've got a lot to talk about. Meet me on the deck of the carrier.

Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Searhus themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
When equipped, the recharge delay for damaged Personal Shields will be reduced by 3.2 seconds.
